description: Try our easy to follow Lamb Wraps recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Wrap,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Easter leftovers,High protein,Christmas,Peanut free
name: Lamb Wraps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg garlic & rosemary lamb leg mini roast

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Cook lamb as per pack instructions. Rest for 10 minutes before slicing.
Meanwhile, shred 6 large mint leaves. Combine with yoghurt and garlic. Season with salt and pepper.
Thinly slice lamb. Spread wraps with yoghurt mixture, top with lamb, cucumber, onion and mint leaves. Roll up to enclose. Wrap in baking paper and tie with string. Serve.
